content.body: is there a matrix/slack/etc like this community but for unicode?

Fernando Fiori: I think what you want to be able to defend is why entry here is correct. Note that I gave some a reason in that discussion as to why it is not (you end up looking at the wrong ancestor chain).

content.body: nektro: I think Unicode is fairly closed, but if you find something that contradicts that, please let me know. (There might still be a public mailing list though.)
